title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-4.34 - Pilot reimbursement projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-4.34 - Pilot reimbursement projects

State Regulations
(a) The commissioner may waive the requirements of this Subpart to effect the development of additional knowledge and experience in different types of reimbursement mechanisms, contingent upon the approval of the United States Department of Health and Human Services where necessary. (b) Individual facilities or groups of facilities shall enter into such ventures with the understanding that the reimbursement received over the life of the projects shall be as defined in the experiment contract. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-4.34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
